thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Central, clean and cool
thread.title_full: Central, clean and cool - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ane H
title: Central, clean and cool
text: Had a great experience at this hotel. So central, people that work there are so nice and the best breakfast ever. We ate so much that we lasted many hours of sightseeing afterwards. Different types of eggs everyday, pancakes sometimes and different desserts and yoghurt. What more can you ask for? I highly recommend this hotel.
